body_html:
@gao8954 we primarily use github issues for tracking bugs and installation issues. For general debugging and help, please ask your question on StackOverflow, and tag it with the tensorflow tag.

I'd suggest you start on the tensorflow.org site and run some of the simple tutorials and examples, and confirm that your installation is correct. Perhaps take a look here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#optional-install-cuda-gpus-on-linux

Thanks!
body_text:
@gao8954 we primarily use github issues for tracking bugs and installation issues.  For general debugging and help, please ask your question on StackOverflow, and tag it with the tensorflow tag.
I'd suggest you start on the tensorflow.org site and run some of the simple tutorials and examples, and confirm that your installation is correct.  Perhaps take a look here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#optional-install-cuda-gpus-on-linux
Thanks!
body:
@gao8954 we primarily use github issues for tracking bugs and installation issues.  For general debugging and help, please ask your question on StackOverflow, and tag it with the `tensorflow` tag.

I'd suggest you start on the tensorflow.org site and run some of the simple tutorials and examples, and confirm that your installation is correct.  Perhaps take a look here:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/get_started/os_setup.html#optional-install-cuda-gpus-on-linux

Thanks!
